pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:0.5: 2. The training rule on the sharing out of out-of-season robe-cloth
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.2: At that time, after completing the rains residence in a village monastery, a number of nuns were traveling to Sāvatthī. They were perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.3: Some lay followers who saw them thought,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.4: “These nuns are perfect in conduct and deportment, but poorly dressed in shabby robes; they must’ve been robbed,” and they gave out-of-season robe-cloth to the Sangha of nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.5: Because they had done the robe-making ceremony, the nun Thullanandā
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.6: determined it as in-season robe-cloth, and then shared it out.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.7: The lay followers asked those nuns whether
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.9: and they replied that they hadn’t
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.10: and told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.12: Those lay followers then complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.13: “How could Venerable Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season’, and then share it out?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.14: The nuns heard the complaints of those lay followers,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.15: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.16: “How could Venerable Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season’, and then share it out?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.17: Those nuns then told the monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.18: who in turn told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha assembled and questioned the monks:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.19: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.22: “… How can the nun Thullanandā determine out-of-season robe-cloth as ‘in-season’, and then share it out?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.23: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.24: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:1.25: ‘If a nun determines out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season”, and then shares it out, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.6: if the robe-making ceremony has not been done, robe-cloth that is given during the eleven months. If the robe-making ceremony has been done, robe-cloth that is given during the seven months. Also, if it is given in the robe season, but the cloth is designated, it is called “out-of-season robe-cloth”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.7: If she shares it out, after determining out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season”, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.8: When the robe-cloth is obtained, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.9: The robe-cloth is to be relinquished to the Sangha of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.10: “And, monks, it’s to be relinquished in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.11: (To be expanded as in Nuns’ Relinquishment 1, [](pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.21--2.1.43), with appropriate substitutions.)
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.12: … ‘Venerables, this out-of-season robe-cloth which I shared out after determining it as “in-season” is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Sangha.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.1.15: ‘I give this robe-cloth back to you.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.1: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.2: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure if it is, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.3: If it is out-of-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as in-season robe-cloth, and she shares it out after determining it as “in-season”, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.4: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she perceives it as out-of-season robe-cloth, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.5: If it is in-season robe-cloth, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.2.6: If it is in-season robe-cloth and she perceives it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.2: if she shares out out-of-season robe-cloth that she perceives as in-season;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.3: if she shares out in-season robe-cloth that she perceives as in-season;
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np2:2.3.6: The second training rule is finished.
